job_history.work_description: Individually responsible for creating Standard Operating Procedure manual for Accounting department which is currently being used by the employees, new hires, executives and internal as well as external auditors. Solely responsible for creating and maintaining a monthly Statistical report that is generated through various banking transaction types, such as deposits, withdrawals, payments, different types of loans booked, transfers and the factors affecting membership at the Credit Union. I also analyze the report, looking for possible errors, researching the solution to the errors, correcting the errors and preparing the final report which is reviewed and utilized by the Board Members, the CEO and other senior staff members to make executive decisions. Responsible for reconciling and monitoring complex General Ledger transactions affecting assigned accounts, researching the differences and communicating outstanding items to appropriate personnel. Responsible for ensuring expenses are coded to appropriate General Ledger accounts and that payments are submitted to vendors in a timely manner. Responsible for developing and establishing procedures to ensure adequate controls for accounting functions are met. Responsible for maintaining Troubled Debt Restructured (TDRs) files for auto loan, credit card loan and mortgage loan accounts and for making necessary journal entries to record the recoveries in the books. Responsible for recurring journal entries. Responsible for maintaining accounting records and reports to ensure compliance using current GAAP principals and company policies.

Assisted HR Generalist in structuring and implementing new procedures and policies for benefits, incentives and new hires. Maintained HR files and personnel files for 110 employees. Assisted HR Generalist in new hire orientation. Processed payroll for 110 employees in bi-weekly basis and prepared monthly, quarterly and yearly payroll report. Updated Compliance programs on regular basis. Maintained, assigned and tracked progress of completed course work for approximately 110 employees and 6 executives using the Better Value and Service (BVS) Learning Management System. Worked with Human Resource Specialist, Training Manager and department managers to ensure staff needs are met in line with compliance department's strategic goals and federal regulatory requirements. General administrative support to the Compliance/Training Manager to include gathering statistical data and the filing of various required regulatory reports. Track, record, and audit member accounts for money laundering or other suspicious account activities through use of Verafin automated anti-money laundering software.

Responsible for entering approved bills into accounting system and processing checks, Automated Clearing House (ACH) and Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT) to make payments. Responsible for maintaining vendors' and accounts payable records including 1099's and W-9's. Responsible for preparing weekly reimbursement vouchers for business expenses and in charge of Corporate Visa Accounts for managers, executives and board members. Responsible for processing Share Drafts and Daily Balancing of ending cash totals for all the branches. Provided back up support to all the accountant positions and assisted with accounting department projects as needed.

education.university: University of Maryland University College, Shady Grove Center

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in accounting, including creating and maintaining financial reports, reconciling complex transactions, and ensuring compliance with GAAP principles.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Responsible for analyzing financial reports, identifying errors, and making corrections, demonstrating strong analytical skills.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Created and maintained financial reports, including statistical reports and general ledger transactions, showing strong proficiency in financial reporting.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Processed payroll for 110 employees and prepared monthly, quarterly, and yearly payroll reports, demonstrating solid working proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: General Ledger Management
skills.explanation: Responsible for reconciling and monitoring complex general ledger transactions, ensuring accurate financial records, and demonstrating strong proficiency in general ledger management.

skills.name: Compliance
skills.explanation: Assisted in maintaining compliance programs, tracking progress of completed course work, and ensuring staff needs were met in line with compliance department's strategic goals, showing solid working proficiency in compliance.

skills.name: Auditing
skills.explanation: Tracked, recorded, and audited member accounts for suspicious activities, demonstrating solid working proficiency in auditing.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Provided backup support to accountant positions and assisted with accounting department projects, showing some practical experience in leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed multiple tasks, including processing payroll, preparing financial reports, and maintaining compliance programs, demonstrating solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Attention to Detail
skills.explanation: Identified and corrected errors in financial reports, demonstrating strong attention to detail.
